survey.title: MIA Community Census Survey Three: Immersion
survey.description: This is the third survey of the experiment!

sections.title: General
sections.description: This section asks a few general questions about your immersion.

questions.label: Experience When Watching With Subtitles
questions.question: Describe your experience/mindset/goal when watching something with subtitles (we're trying to understand how you immerse)

questions.label: Method to Discover New Listening Content
questions.question: How do you go about discovering new listening content you're interested in? What criteria do you use to choose listening content

questions.label: Pauses During Immersion to Try Understanding Particular Sentences
questions.question: While engaging with your target language, do you often pause for long periods of time trying to understand a particular sentence?  (1 - never; 5 - multiple times a minute)?

questions.label: % Of Content Consumed With Translations in Native Language
questions.question: What percentage of your active listening content did you consume with subtitles/translations in your native language?

questions.label: Hours of Weekly Active Listening
questions.question: How many hours of active listening do you do a week in your target languge?

questions.label: Stops Immersing To Lookup a Word
questions.question: While actively listening, how often do you stop to look words up? (1 - never; 5 - multiple times a minute)

questions.label: Experience When Active Listening
questions.question: Describe your experience/mindset/goal when actively immersing
questions.note: We're simply trying to understand how you immerse - no need to overthink this question.

questions.label: % Of Active Listening With Anime
questions.question: What percentage of your active listening content is done with anime?
questions.note: Try not to stress too much about the exact percentage. We'll be asking a few questions about the type of content you do active listening with, but try not to stress about whether your answers to these percentage questions add up to 100% or anything.

questions.label: Understands Active Listening With Anime
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with anime do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Active Listening With Anime
questions.question: How much do you enjoy your active listening content done with anime? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Active Listening With Dramas
questions.question: What percentage of your active listening content is done with dramas?

questions.label: Understands Active Listening With Dramas
questions.question: How much of the active listening content you do with dramas do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Active Listening With Dramas
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with dramas do you enjoy? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Active Listening With YouTube Original Content
questions.question: What percentage of your active listening content is done with YouTube original content (A re-upload of news onto YouTube does not fit into this category; however, a vlogger does fit into this category since it's original content)?

questions.label: Understands Active Listening With YouTube Original Content
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with YouTube original content do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Active Listening With YouTube Original Content
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with YouTube original content do you enjoy? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Active Listening With Podcasts & Radio Shows
questions.question: What percentage of your active listening content is done with podcasts/radio shows?

questions.label: Understands Active Listening With Podcasts & Radio Shows
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with podcasts/radio shows do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Active Listening With Podcasts & Radio Shows
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with podcasts/radio shows do you enjoy? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Active Listening With Podcasts
questions.question: What percentage of your active listening content is done with podcasts/radio shows?

questions.label: Understands Active Listening With Audiobooks
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with audiobooks do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Active Listening With Audiobooks
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with audiobooks do you enjoy? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Active Listening With News
questions.question: What percentage of your active listening content is done with news?

questions.label: Understands Active Listening With News
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with news do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Active Listening With News
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with news do you enjoy? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Active Listening With Lectures
questions.question: What percentage of your active listening content is done with lectures?

questions.label: Understands Active Listening With Lectures
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with lectures do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Active Listening With Lectures
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with lectures do you enjoy? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Active Listening With Native Speaker Conversations
questions.question: What percentage of your active listening content is done with native speaker conversations? (e.x a YT video or podcast with a native Japanese speaker

questions.label: Understands Active Listening With Native Speaker Conversations
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with native speaker conversations do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Active Listening With Native Speaker Conversations
questions.question: How much of your active listening content done with native speaker conversations do you enjoy? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Active Listening You Download
questions.question: What percentage of your active listening content do you download and listen to locally (as opposed to streaming via YouTube, Spotify, etc)?

questions.label: % Of Active Listening You Download on Computer
questions.question: Of the active listening content you download locally, what percentage of that do you listen to on your computer (as opposed to your phone)?

questions.label: % Of Active Listening You Download on Mobile
questions.question: Of the active listening content you download locally, what percentage of that do you listen to on your phone (as opposed to your computer)?

questions.label: % Of Active Immersion You Stream
questions.question: What % of your active immersion content do you stream?

questions.label: % Of Active Immersion You Stream on Computer
questions.question: Of the active immersion content you stream, what percentage of that do you listen to on your computer (as opposed to your phone)?

questions.label: % Of Active Listening You Stream on Television
questions.question: Of the active listening content you stream, what percentage of that do you consume on TV (as opposed to your phone)?

questions.label: % Of Active Listening You Stream on Mobile
questions.question: Of the active listening content you stream, what percentage of that do you listen to on your phone (as opposed to your computer)?

questions.label: Sources of Streaming Content
questions.question: Where do you stream from? (e.x Netflix, YouTube, Hulu, N/A, etc)

questions.label: Hrs Of Weekly Passive Listening
questions.question: On average, how many hours of passive listening do you do in a week?
questions.note: If you are unsure, refer to the definition of passive listening on the quickstart guide on the MIA site

questions.label: % Of Passive Listening With Already-Consumed Content
questions.question: What % of your passive listening is done with content that you ahve already actively listened to at least once?

questions.label: Enjoys Passive Listening
questions.question: How much do you enjoy passive listening? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love passive listening)

questions.label: Hrs Of Weekly Background Listening
questions.question: On average, how many hours of background listening do you do in a week?
questions.note: If you are unsure, refer to the definition of background listening on the quickstart guide on the MIA site

questions.label: Finds Background Listening Distracting
questions.question: Do you find background listening distracting? (1 - not at all; 5 - it is so distracting that I cannot focus on anything else)

questions.label: Finds Background Listening Useful
questions.question: Do you find background listening useful? (1 - not at all; 5 - extremely useful)

questions.label: Immersion With TL Subtitles
questions.question: How many hours of immersion do you do in a week with subtitles in your target language?

questions.label: Stops To Lookup Words During Active Immersion
questions.question: How often do you stop to lookup a word during active immersion? (1 - never; 5 - multiple times a minute)

questions.label: Content With TL Subtitles
questions.question: What type of content do you watch with target language subtitles and where do you get/consume this content (e.x Netflix, Crunchyroll, downloading mp4s)? (Feel free to put N/A if this question doesn't apply to you)

questions.label: Immersion With Native Language Subtitles
questions.question: How many hours of immersion do you do in a week with subtitles in your native language?

questions.label: Reason For Immersion With Native Language Subtitles
questions.question: What is your reason for immersing with native language subtitles? (e.x comprehension; beginner in TL; etc)

questions.label: Experience When Reading
questions.question: Describe your experience/mindset/goal when reading (we're trying to understand how you immerse)

questions.label: Hours of Reading in TL
questions.question: How many hours of reading do you do a week in your target language?

questions.label: Often Looks Up Words While Reading
questions.question: How often do you stop to lookup a word while reading? (1 - never; 5 - multiple times a minute)

questions.label: Method to Find Reading Content
questions.question: How do you go about finding reading content (i.e Amazon, MIA Discord, etc), and what criteria do you use to choose reading content?

questions.label: % Of Reading With Nonfiction
questions.question: What percentage of your reading is done with nonfiction?
questions.note: Try not to stress too much about the exact percentage. We'll be asking a few questions about the type of content you read, but try not to stress about whether your answers to these percentage questions add up to 100% or anything.

questions.label: Understands Reading With Nonfiction
questions.question: How much of your reading done with nonfiction do you understand? (1 - almost nothing; 5 - almost everything)

questions.label: Enjoys Reading Nonfiction
questions.question: How much do you enjoy reading nonfiction? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Reading With Novels
questions.question: What percentage of your reading is done with novels?

questions.label: Understands Reading With Novels
questions.question: How much of your reading done with novels do you understand? (1 - almost nothing; 5 - almost everything)

questions.label: Enjoys Reading Novels
questions.question: How much do you enjoy reading novels? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Reading With Manga or Comic Books
questions.question: What percentage of your reading is done with manga or comic books?

questions.label: Understands Reading With Manga or Comic Books
questions.question: How much of your reading done with manga or comic books do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Reading Manga or Comic Books
questions.question: How much do you enjoy reading manga or comic books? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Reading With Children Books
questions.question: What percentage of your reading is done with children books?

questions.label: Understands Reading With Children Books
questions.question: How much of your reading done with children books do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Reading Children Books
questions.question: How much do you enjoy reading children books? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Reading With Graded Readers
questions.question: What percentage of your reading is done with graded readers?

questions.label: Understands Reading With Graded Readers
questions.question: How much of your reading done with graded readers do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Reading Graded Readers
questions.question: How much do you enjoy reading graded readers? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Reading With Blogs and Articles
questions.question: What percentage of your reading is done with blogs and articles online?

questions.label: Understands Reading With Blogs and Articles
questions.question: How much of your reading done with blogs and articles do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Reading Blogs and Articles
questions.question: How much do you enjoy reading blogs and articles? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Reading With Social Media
questions.question: What percentage of your reading is done with things on social media?

questions.label: Understands Reading With Social Media
questions.question: How much of your reading done with things on social media do you understand? (1 - I barely understand it; 5 - I understand the vast majority of it)

questions.label: Enjoys Reading Things On Social Media
questions.question: How much do you enjoy reading things on social media? (1 - don't enjoy at all; 5 - love this content)

questions.label: % Of Reading Physical Books
questions.question: What percentage of your reading is done with physical books?

questions.label: % Of Reading In Internet Browser
questions.question: What percentage of your reading is done in an internet browser (i.e browsing websites in your target language on Chrome)?

questions.label: % Of Reading Ebooks
questions.question: What percentage of your reading is done with ebooks? (i.e epub, mobi, etc files)

questions.label: Where You Read Ebooks
questions.question: Where do you read ebooks? (e.x kindle device, computer, specific website or app, etc)

questions.label: # Of Language Parents
questions.question: How many language parents do you have?
questions.note: This refers to the concept of a parent in shadowing. Refer to the MIA website for further explanation of the concept

questions.label: Method to Choose Language Parents
questions.question: How did you go about finding and choosing your language parents?

questions.label: Hours of Listening to Language Parent(s)
questions.question: How many hours a week do you listen to your language parent(s)?

questions.label: Hours of Shadowing
questions.question: How many hours a week do you shadow in your target language?

questions.label: Method Of Shadowing
questions.question: How do you go about shadowing in your target language? (i.e what is your workflow like)

questions.label: Hours of Output
questions.question: How many hours a week do you output in your target language?

questions.label: Where You Output
questions.question: Where do you output in your target language? (e.x italki, with friends in person, on Discord servers, etc)

questions.label: Often Corrected While Speaking
questions.question: How often do you get corrected while speaking? (1 - virtually never; 3 - every 20 sentences or so; 5 - every few sentences)

questions.label: Writing Often Corrected
questions.question: How often do you get your writing corrected?  (1 I donâ€™t have my writing corrected, 5 - I get everything I write corrected)
